<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Presentation of a Poem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung eines Gedichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation d'une poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de um poema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione di un poem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση ενός ποιήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de un poema</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an activity where 12th grade students make an oral presentation of a poem to their class, based on the teacher instructions and assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Aktivität, in der 12. 
Gradkursteilnehmer ihrer Kategorie eine Munddarstellung von einem 
Gedicht bilden, basiert auf der Lehreranweisungen und -einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité où les 12èmes étudiants de 
catégorie font une présentation orale d'une poésie à leur classe, 
basée sur la rubrique d'instructions et d'évaluation de professeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade onde os 1òs estudantes da 
classe façam uma apresentação oral de um poema a sua classe, 
baseada no rubric das instruções e da avaliação do professor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività dove i dodicesimi allievi del
grado fanno una presentazione orale di un poem al loro codice 
categoria, basata sulla rubrica di istruzioni e di valutazione 
dell'insegnante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 12$οι σπουδαστές
βαθμού παρουσιάζουν προφορική ενός ποιήματος στην κλάση τους, 
βασισμένη στη ρουμπρίκα οδηγιών και αξιολόγησης των δασκάλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad donde los 12mos estudiantes 
del grado hacen una presentación oral de un poema a su clase, basada 
en la rúbrica de las instrucciones y del gravamen del profesor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
